Class PlayHeroCardChooseOneAction

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, HasBattlecry, Notification

    public class PlayHeroCardChooseOneAction
extends PlayHeroCardAction
    Since choose one hero cards are implemented as different battlecry choices, a card reference to a choose one card is not stored here.
